feed.title: Moe Memos Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Moe Memos: 0.7.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added French localization by @3zmana.
  • Added Turkish translation by @SirCrownguard.
  • Prevented double-clicking on the back button in the top app bar by @imkero.
  • Fixed the display of attachments when using local storage with Memos 0.19.0 or later.
  • Removed automatic resizing of pictures during upload.
  • Removed the legacy "Login with OpenID" method.
  • Login status will no longer expire when logging in with username and password.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mudkipme/MoeMemosAndroid/compare/0.7.2...0.7.3

entry.title: New release for Moe Memos: 0.7.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added Italian localization by @tombatti.
  • Fixed the display of attachments when using local storage with Memos 0.21.0 or later.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mudkipme/MoeMemosAndroid/compare/0.7.3...0.7.4

entry.title: New release for Moe Memos: 0.8.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added support for Memos 0.22.1 and 0.22.2. Versions 0.15 to 0.21 are still supported.
  • Added beta support for multiple Memos instances or accounts and switching between them.
  • Added support for drag and drop on certain Android devices by @fightyz.
  • Introduced initial support for tablet layout.
  • Enabled the deletion of memos without the need to archive them first.

New Contributors

  • @fightyz made their first contribution in https://github.com/mudkipme/MoeMemosAndroid/pull/166

Changes since 0.8.0

  • Supports Memos 0.22.1 and 0.22.2. Please upgrade to 0.22.1 or higher if you are using 0.22.0.
  • Fixed the issue where tags were not created when using Memos 0.21 or lower.
  • Fixed the issue where the username wasn't displayed on the Explore page.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mudkipme/MoeMemosAndroid/compare/0.7.4...0.8.1

entry.title: New release for Moe Memos: 0.8.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added support for Markdown strikethrough syntax by @jkuhlemann.
  • Added initial Markdown blockquote support by @jkuhlemann.
  • Fixed attaching images to existing memos by @mudkipme.
  • Added confirmation dialogue when exiting memo editorby @jkuhlemann.

New Contributors

  • @jkuhlemann made their first contribution in https://github.com/mudkipme/MoeMemosAndroid/pull/192

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mudkipme/MoeMemosAndroid/compare/0.8.1...0.8.2

entry.title: New release for Moe Memos: 0.8.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added expand fab animation when scrolling by @Divinelink
  • Added initial hold to edit functionality by @jkuhlemann
  • Supports Memos 0.23.0. Due to API changes, some features may no longer work with 0.22.x.

New Contributors

  • @Divinelink made their first contribution in https://github.com/mudkipme/MoeMemosAndroid/pull/203

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mudkipme/MoeMemosAndroid/compare/0.8.2...0.8.3
